short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save any page offline. Access anytime | Add notes, classify links, search saved links. Built to 10x productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link Locker is your ultimate tool for managing, organizing, and accessing your favourite web links with ease. Save important pages, articles, and resources offline directly from your browser, and access them anytime, anywhere. With Link Locker, you can:

	•	Save Links Instantly: Capture web pages with just a click and store them securely offline in your Link Locker.
	•	Organize with Tags: Use custom tags to categorize your saved links, making it easy to find exactly what you need.
	•	Add Personal Notes: Keep track of your thoughts or ideas by adding notes to your saved links.
	•	Seamless Navigation: Open saved links directly from your archive, making browsing and revisiting your favorite pages effortless.

Current Version V1- MVP. 
The idea was to build and deploy asap and get feedback. Happy to improve tool with time.

If this extension gets enough love, I’ll update the UI and make it even better for everyone. I hope Bookmark Ninja adds value to your life. If it does, please share it with your network.

Feedback and suggestions highly appreciated!
Feel free to share at randombisht69@gmail.com
